== তারেক হাসান (Tareq Hasan) ==
Hi, I am Tareq Hasan from Bangladesh. I am a tech personality who is developing his career as LAMP professional. I am studying on Computer Science & Engineering (CSE) at University of Rajshahi.

I love, use and promote Ubuntu in Bangladesh.
